name: Quack Quest
description:
Feed your ducklings and protect them from bears!

The more ducklings you protect, the more powerful your quack is!

Lead the ducklings to grass and tell them to eat, once they are all full, you win!

Watch out for the bears! Quack to keep them away! Your quack is only powerful enough when you are near a duckling!

This is my submission for GMTK Game Jam 2021
